attributes.action: create a nationalised employment ombudsman to regulate employee rights, and provide clear rights and entitlements information for all U.K. employees regardless of their trade or sector.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I find it unbelievable that we do not seem to have an independant employment rights regulatory body that works for employees rather than business owners. Both Direct.gov and Acas seem to only provide vague and ambiguous information and both seem to be aimed at business owners.
